channel.title: Comments on: A Coming-Out Letter
channel.description: BDSM, books and missing links by Xiao Yingtai

item.title: By: Xiao Yingtai
item.dc:creator: Xiao Yingtai
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/coming-out-letter/#comment-359">Brian</a>.
Thank you! I really should stop being amazed that doms find it interesting to hear what makes a sub tick. After all I am still intensely curious why on earth they would want all that responsibility. Although you seem to be thinking of it more in terms of gender than I do?
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Brian.

Thank you! I really should stop being amazed that doms find it interesting to hear what makes a sub tick. After all I am still intensely curious why on earth they would want all that responsibility. Although you seem to be thinking of it more in terms of gender than I do?

item.title: By: Brian
item.dc:creator: Brian
item.description: Wonderful blog - thoughtful writing. Nice to meet you. It's the thrill of finding out what truly turns a woman on that is as much a part of BDSM as 'playing the roles', I think.
item.content:encoded: Wonderful blog – thoughtful writing. Nice to meet you. It’s the thrill of finding out what truly turns a woman on that is as much a part of BDSM as ‘playing the roles’, I think.

item.title: By: JT
item.dc:creator: JT
item.description: Wow. You do a great job of articulating things that defy articulation. :)
item.content:encoded: Wow. You do a great job of articulating things that defy articulation. :)

item.title: By: Yingtai
item.dc:creator: Yingtai
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/coming-out-letter/#comment-18">Steve</a>.
Apologies, it took me this long to figure out what you meant. I'm a little nervous when I read "prepared to do whatever I require." You are not throwing out the sub's right to limits, I hope?
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Steve.

Apologies, it took me this long to figure out what you meant. I’m a little nervous when I read “prepared to do whatever I require.” You are not throwing out the sub’s right to limits, I hope?

item.title: By: Steve
item.dc:creator: Steve
item.description: I think I understand you. Women I was in the process of getting to know might ask what turns me on? After giving this recurring question some real thought, I realize what turns me on is not a specific act, but having the knowledge that the woman in my life is prepared to do whatever I require. It is her (slavery, submissiveness) and her being prepared to bend to my desires rather than any specific act that is my real turn on.
item.content:encoded: I think I understand you. Women I was in the process of getting to know might ask what turns me on? After giving this recurring question some real thought, I realize what turns me on is not a specific act, but having the knowledge that the woman in my life is prepared to do whatever I require. It is her (slavery, submissiveness) and her being prepared to bend to my desires rather than any specific act that is my real turn on.
